registration.registration-dates: For registration dates and details, check the corresponding event page
registration.changes-to-registration: Any changes to Registration Details, such as Discord Name and Decklists must be made until the end of 29th of August through Private Message in the Event's Discord Server
registration.considered-registered: You will only be considered registered if you have sent Proof of payment
registration.discord-link: Discord Invite Link is provided in the Registration Form

refunds.refund-details: For refund dates and details, check the corresponding event page

elegibility.areas: Players from Main land Portugal, the isles and emigrants may register
elegibility.speak: Players need to know how to speak Portuguese
elegibility.remote: The Player is required to have a remote set-up to be able to participate
elegibility.internet: A stable internet connection, clear audio and clear visuals are necessary

rules.cant-find-opponent: Contact a member of the Judge Team or Moderation team if you can't find your opponent or your table
rules.recording: Players may record their matches for the purpose of showing events to the judges but players may NOT keep the recording
rules.delete-recording: Recordings need to be deleted after each round
rules.found-cheating: If a player is found to be cheating, conducting innapropriate behaviour or going against Official Bandai rules, that player will be given a warning, game loss, Disqualification from the event or a permanent ban from participating in our events depending on the gravity of the situation
rules.final-word: The moderation team will have the final word in the event of the judge decision not being accepted by the involved parties

ban-list.look-at-event: For ban list details, check the corresponding event page

warnings.5-mins-late-with-warning: Arriving 5 minutes late to the match, WITH an heads up given to a Judge or Moderator, after the round has been announced: 1 warning
warnings.5-mins-late-without-warning: Arriving 5 minutes late to the match, WITHOUT giving an heads up to a Judge or Moderator, after the round has been announced: 1 round of the Bo3 lost
warnings.10-mins-late: Arriving 10 minutes late to the match, REGARDLESS if an heads up was given or not, after the round has been announced: Round Auto-loss

rounds.not-eliminated: If a player has lost a round they aren't immeadiately eliminated
rounds.regardless-of-losses: A player may play out the tournament to completion regardless of the number of losses
rounds.swiss: Tournament will work on a Swiss Round Format, and each round will be played on a Best of 3 format, first player to win 2 out of the 3 games in a round is considered the winner of that round
rounds.50-mins: Players have 50 minutes to complete their Bo3
rounds.extra-time: If 50 minutes have passed and there isn't a clear winner yet, 4 extra turns are granted and a total of 5 minutes are given to finish the 4 extra rounds
rounds.turn-0: The player whose turn it is when the timeout is called is considered the turn 0 for extra turns, then players play the extra turns until they finish turn 3
rounds.middle-of-attack: If the extra time is over in the middle of resolving an attack, the attack is resolved as normal and only after it has resolved the round is truly over

deck.cannot-change: Users cannot change decks between rounds or matches
deck.only-on-signup: Only the registered deck during signup may be used

prizes.details: For prizing details, check the corresponding event page
prizes.boosters: Players are awarded Boosters to be divided across the top placing players
prizes.represent: Winner and 2nd place are given the invite to represent Portugal in addition to the boosters
prizes.free-entry: The free entry awarded to the winner cannot be transfered to another player, if the winner cannot attend the next event this free entry will be lost
prizes.freshly-open: The display from where the boosters come from will be freshly opened on stream
prizes.opened: If the Player wishes, the booster packs may be opened on stream
prizes.of-value: If a pack gets opened on stream due to player choice, that player may choose to have only some singles shipped to them and not have the rest of the bulk shipped

shipping.free-shipping: Shipping is Free for Players participating in Portugal and Portuguese Islands
shipping.outside-of-portugal: Portuguese Players living outside of Portugal may have to pay extra for shipping
shipping.packed-on-stream: The prizes will be packed on stream as a display of trutghfullness

faq.for-more-details: For more event details, visit the

eligible-players.title: Eligible Representatives
eligible-players.to-be-representative: To be an eligible representative to represent Portugal against another country
eligible-players.won-invite: Must have won an Invite in a Digital Selection Event leading up to the representation event
eligible-players.remote-setup: Must have a remote set up to be able to play against people from other countries
eligible-players.speak-english: Must be able to speak English fluently enough to communicate with your remote opponent
eligible-players.portuguese: Must be Portuguese, live in main land Portugal, Portuguese Islands, or be a Portuguese emigrant
eligible-players.not-meet-requirements: If a player, who has won a invite, does not meet these requirements
eligible-players.passed-down: The invite will be passed down to the next placing player in the corresponding tournament in which the invite was won at
eligible-players.repeated: This process will be repeated until a suitable candidate is found
eligible-players.non-transmissible: Invites are non transmissible. If the player has communicated to the Organizing team that they cannot participate, the Organizing team will handle the transfering of the invite to the next suitable candidate, not the player

home.title: Digital Selection Event portugal
home.what-is-body:
The "Digital Selection Event" is a community led initiative started in Portugal to select a handful of players to represent the country against other countries.
A series of events are held and the top qualifying players are invited to represent Portugal.

tooltip.year:
The year in which the event will happen.

Previous years will be maintained por historic preservation of previous events.
tooltip.country:
The adversary country in which you'll quality against.

The selected country will always be the adversary country to the portuguese team during the "VS" type event.

Countries for which there's no active events will be preserved for history of previous events.
tooltip.event:
The event in which you're wanting to participate.

Players can only participate in events of "Selection" type.

The events of type "VS" are reserved for the winners of the "Selection" type events.

first-selection.top1: Winner: Invite to represent Portugal in Portugal VS France and Free entry for next event
first-selection.top2: 2nd Place: Invite to represent Portugal in Portugal VS France
first-selection.prizes-for-top: BT17 Boosters to be divided across top placed players

selection-details.first-selection-winner: Winner of the First Selection Event (31.08.2024)
selection-details.first-selection-second-place: 2nd place of the First Selection Event (31.08.2024)
selection-details.second-selection-winner: Winner of the Second Selection Event (09.2024)
selection-details.second-selection-second-place: 2nd place of the Second Selection Event (09.2024)
selection-details.second-selection-third-place: 3nd place of the Second Selection Event (09.2024)

registration.be-made: Registrations must be made until the 29th of August 23:59 GMT+1

refunds.week-prior: Refunds will only be issued until 1 week prior (23.08.2024)
refunds.non-refundable: Any registration made within the week of the event (26.08 to 30.08) are non refundable

ban-list.new-banlist: The 31 August 2024 ban list WILL NOT be used
